name: The start date determines the first due date of the calculated schedule. We assume

children.description: Given details of "5000.0","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate each schedule entry is always due on the same day as the "2018-01-01"
Given details of "8000.0","4.0",'6' and "2018-02-04" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate each schedule entry is always due on the same day as the "2018-02-04"

userStory.storyName: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases

title: The start date determines the first due date of the calculated schedule. We assume
description: that each schedule entry is always due on the same day

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given details of "<loanAmount>","<nominalRate>",'<duration>' and "<startDate>" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate each schedule entry is always due on the same day as the "<startDate>"
